SEARCH
Package controller.db

Interface OrderDao

All Known Implementing Classes:
JdbcOrderDao
public interface OrderDao
The OrderDao interface provides methods for interacting with the database regarding orders and order lines. It includes methods for saving, deleting, updating, and selecting orders and order lines.
Version:
0.1
Author:
DaniAndries

  • Method Details

    • saveOrder

      void saveOrder(Order order) throws SQLException
      Saves a new order to the database.
      Parameters:
      order - The Order object to be saved.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a database access error.

    • saveOrderLine

      void saveOrderLine(OrderLine orderLine, Order order) throws SQLException
      Saves a new order line associated with an order to the database.
      Parameters:
      orderLine - The OrderLine object to be saved.
      order - The Order object associated with the order line.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a database access error.

    • findtOrder

      Order findtOrder(int id) throws SQLException
      Retrieves an order by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the order to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The Order object with the specified ID, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a database access error.

    • findOrdersByClient

      List<Order> findOrdersByClient(Client client) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of orders associated with a specific client.
      Parameters:
      client - The Client whose orders are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Order objects associated with the client.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a database access error.

    • findOrderByState

      Order findOrderByState(OrderState state, Client client) throws SQLException
      Retrieves an order by its state and associated client.
      Parameters:
      state - The OrderState to filter by.
      client - The Client associated with the order.
      Returns:
      The Order object matching the specified state and client, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a database access error.

    • findOrderLine

      OrderLine findOrderLine(int id) throws SQLException
      Retrieves an order line by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the order line to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The OrderLine object with the specified ID, or null if not found.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a database access error.

    • findOrderLinesByOrder

      List<OrderLine> findOrderLinesByOrder(Order order) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of order lines associated with a specific order.
      Parameters:
      order - The Order whose order lines are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of OrderLine objects associated with the order.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If there is a database access error.
